record.dc:title: 52BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burials 15BY85 and 86 (skull). In foreground is burial 15BY86 which was precedent to burial 85 and disturbed.
record.wpa:narrative: [15BY85] Mature female in poor condition, extended on back with head to SE. The skull of burial 86 lay on its occipital, face-up with basilar portion at extended finger-tips of right hand of burial 85. Skull and right patella of burial 86 disturbed by intrusion of 85. [15BY86] Mature male in poor condition, extended on back with head to NW. The skull lay at the level of 15BY85, 0.3' above the left humerus of 15BY86 and at the right finger tips of 15BY85--apparently dislodged by the intrusion of 15BY85. The right patella of 15BY86 was also dislodged and lay on the left side of the undisturbed mandible.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations available on file. See also photograph 54BY11.
